projects.title: Tourist Online Booking With email Notification
projects.description: A full-stack web application for booking tourist services with email notifications using Nodemailer.

projects.title: PhilQueake Monitoring App
projects.description: Earthquake monitoring application providing real-time updates and alerts for seismic activities.

projects.title: /Filipino Discord Server
projects.description: A vibrant Filipino community on Discord where members can connect, socialize, and engage with fellow Filipinos and friends. A welcoming space for meaningful conversations and genuine connections.

projects.title: The Vocals - Discord Music Bots
projects.description: Your ultimate music companion for Discord featuring VocalVibes (karaoke bot) and VibeTunes (music bot). Experience high-quality audio streaming with crystal clear sound, 99.9% uptime, and support for YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud & more.

projects.title: Elixir Discord Bot
projects.description: A powerful gamification bot for Discord featuring quests, seasons, achievements, and role rewards. Level up your Discord server with engaging daily quests and XP progression system.

projects.title: UniBuddy - Campus Connection Platform
projects.description: Connect with students across the Philippines. Meet and chat with fellow students from universities across Luzon, Visayas, and Mindanao. Anonymous or open your choice. A social platform for university students to network and communicate.
